processingCommand.script:
! Restart modules
:IF "${RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#}" = "Mbuild"
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "with mbuild"
:ELSE
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "without mbuild"
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &WMS_RESTART#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_RESTART#      = "false"
:SET &RW_RESTART#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_RESTART#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART#  = "false"

:IF "${SOURCE_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_WMS_P_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &WMS_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SOURCE_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:    SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_WMS_PRIMARY_URL#
:    SET &WMS_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_WMS_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &WMS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF "${SOURCE_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_REFS_P_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &REFS_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SOURCE_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:    SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_REFS_PRIMARY_URL#
:    SET &REFS_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_REFS_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &REFS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF "${SOURCE_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_RW_P_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &RW_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SOURCE_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:    SET &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_RW_PRIMARY_URL#
:    SET &RW_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_RW_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &RW_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF "${SOURCE_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_EMS_P_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &EMS_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SOURCE_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:    SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_EMS_PRIMARY_URL#
:    SET &EMS_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_EMS_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &EMS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF "${SOURCE_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_WMS_F_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SOURCE_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:    SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_WMS_FAILOVER_URL#
:    SET &WMS_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_WMS_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &WMS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF "${SOURCE_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_REFS_F_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SOURCE_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:    SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_REFS_FAILOVER_URL#
:    SET &REFS_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_REFS_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &REFS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF "${SOURCE_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_RW_F_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SOURCE_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:    SET &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_RW_FAILOVER_URL#
:    SET &RW_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_RW_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &RW_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF "${SOURCE_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#}" <> ""
:  IF "${SOURCE_EMS_F_SHOULD_RUN#}" = "true"
:    SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:    SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SOURCE_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:    SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SOURCE_EMS_FAILOVER_URL#
:    SET &EMS_USERNAME# = &SOURCE_EMS_USERNAME#
:    PUBLISH &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:    PUBLISH &EMS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
